room_title: Escape room "The Detective" by Escape Room Sarasota in Sarasota
room_description:
Richie Falcone has been the top detective in the Brooklyn area for years. He was very respected and loved until a source revealed that he has been secretly working with local mobsters for years! He has gotten himself in so deep that he now has to find innocent citizens to pin their crimes on. He has searched for days for the perfect bystanders and has finally found somebody. And that's you!
You are being framed for these mobster's crimes and of course, everybody believes this top detective. You now have 60 minutes to sneak into Detective Falcone's office and find evidence to put these mobsters and this crooked detective behind bars.
